Package com.bomber7.core.model.map

Class LevelMap

java.lang.Object
com.bomber7.core.model.map.LevelMap
public class LevelMap extends Object
Represents a level with a map in the game. Responsible for loading and parsing the map data from a file.

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelMap

      public LevelMap(String mapName, List<List<Square>> checkerboard, int windowWidth, int windowHeight)
      Constructs a LevelMap with the specified checkerboard.
      Parameters:
      mapName - the name of the map
      checkerboard - a 2D list representing the checkerboard of squares
      windowWidth - the width of the window in pixels
      windowHeight - the height of the window in pixels

      y - the y-coordinate of the square
      Returns:
      the square at the specified coordinates
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the coordinates are out of bounds

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Returns the width of the checkerboard (number of columns). We look at the first row because we verify in the factory that all rows have the same number of columns.
      Returns:
      the width of the checkerboard

    • getHeight

    • getSquareCoordinates

      public org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<Integer,Integer> getSquareCoordinates(int x, int y)
      Returns the absolute coordinates of the square at the specified coordinates. This method calculates the absolute pixel coordinates based on the current screen size and scale.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the square
      y - the y-coordinate of the square
      Returns:
      a Pair containing the absolute x and y coordinates
